name: Shootin' 'em Boxes
description:
A game to play with friends. You can test your shooting skills among friends with this fairly simple shooting game. Boxes appear in the world randomly and you need to shoot them to earns points but beware as some boxes take away your points too. But fret not as some boxes increase the timer on countdown too.

This game focussed towards encouraging new players trying out FPS for the first time and getting a hang of it.
